plot: A cinematic essay that explores universal existential questions through the thinking of Sudanese refugee Peter Ekwiri and archival material on his case, one of the dark spots in the history of Swedish migration politics.
title: Thaumazein
plot_es: A cinematic essay that explores universal existential questions through the thinking of Sudanese refugee Peter Ekwiri and archival material on his case, one of the dark spots in the history of Swedish migration politics.
plot_en: A cinematic essay that explores universal existential questions through the thinking of Sudanese refugee Peter Ekwiri and archival material on his case, one of the dark spots in the history of Swedish migration politics.
